en.pl_cglink:
Can't generate join link
ℹ️ Check if the bot is admin, and haves the permission to generate them
en.pl_cjoin:
Player can't join chat
ℹ️ Check if the player is banned from the chat, if so, unban it
en.pl_retry:
Something bad happened 😖
Please try again...
en.gpl_nopayload: `/play` command can't be used without any URL
en.gpl_volvale: `Volume` must have an integer value between 0 and 200
en.gpl_volupd:
🔊 Volume set to {}%
⚠️ Take in account, that this command normally fails due to a Telegram bug
en.gpl_nonext: There isn't any remaining songs to play
